DOC.brief_summary: Study design : The study two arm randomise control trial ( randomisation ratio 1:1 ) compare aerobic exercise training intervention usual care plus exercise advice . The primary outcome feasibility intervention novel primary therapy men localise prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Training Novel Primary Therapy Men With Localised Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: In accordance NICE active surveillance guideline , men : Who evaluate use combination clinical , biochemical , image and/or biopsy , within last 12 month With histologically confirm low intermediate risk prostate cancer , Gleason score ≤7 ( 3+4 , 4+3 ) With T2a clinical stage tumour With pretreatment PSA ≤20 ng/mL Who willing participate optimal active surveillance provide write informed consent With life expectancy ≥10 year Men : With unstable angina With uncontrolled hypertension With recent myocardial infarction ( within past 6 month ) With pacemaker Already undertake regular physical activity ( great 90 minute moderate intensity exercise , per week ) exclude With physical mental limitation prevent participation trial assessment Participating clinical trial might bias evaluation primary objective present study
